The approval is cleared when the token is transferred.<!-- -->Only a single account can be approved at a time, so approving the zero address clears previous approvals.<!-- -->Requirements:<!-- -->- The caller must own the token or be an approved operator. - <code>tokenId</code> must exist. |

|  [renounceOwnership](./rain-sdk.gatednft.renounceownership.md) |  | (overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call <code>onlyOwner</code> functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.<!-- -->NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner. |
|  [royaltyInfo](./rain-sdk.gatednft.royaltyinfo.md) |  | (salePrice: BigNumberish, overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;[RoyaltyInfo](./rain-sdk.royaltyinfo.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Returns how much royalty is owed and to whom, based on a sale price that may be denominated in any unit of exchange. The royalty amount is denominated and should be payed in that same unit of exchange. |
|  [safeTransferFrom](./rain-sdk.gatednft.safetransferfrom.md) |  | (from: string, to: string, tokenId: BigNumberish, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Safely transfers <code>tokenId</code> token from <code>from</code> to <code>to</code>, checking first that contract recipients are aware of the ERC721 protocol to prevent tokens from being forever locked.<!-- -->Requirements:<!-- -->- <code>from</code> cannot be the zero address. - <code>to</code> cannot be the zero address. - <code>tokenId</code> token must exist and be owned by <code>from</code>. - If the caller is not <code>from</code>, it must be have been allowed to move this token by either approve() or setApprovalForAll(). - If <code>to</code> refers to a smart contract, it must implement <code>IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received</code>, which is called upon a safe transfer. |
|  [safeTransferFromWithData](./rain-sdk.gatednft.safetransferfromwithdata.md) |  | (from: string, to: string, tokenId: BigNumberish, data: BytesLike, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Safely transfers <code>tokenId</code> token from <code>from</code> to <code>to</code>.<!-- -->Requirements:<!-- -->- <code>from</code> cannot be the zero address. - <code>to</code> cannot be the zero address. - <code>tokenId</code> token must exist and be owned by <code>from</code>. - If the caller is not <code>from</code>, it must be approved to move this token by either approve() or setApprovalForAll(). - If <code>to</code> refers to a smart contract, it must implement <code>IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received</code>, which is called upon a safe transfer. |
|  [setApprovalForAll](./rain-sdk.gatednft.setapprovalforall.md) |  | (operator: string, approved: boolean, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Approve or remove <code>operator</code> as an operator for the caller. Operators can call <code>transferFrom()</code> or <code>safeTransferFrom()</code> for any token owned by the caller.<!-- -->Requirements:<!-- -->- The <code>operator</code> cannot be the caller. |
|  [supportsInterface](./rain-sdk.gatednft.supportsinterface.md) |  | (interfaceId: BytesLike, overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;boolean&gt; | Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by <code>interfaceId</code>. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165\#how-interfaces-are-identified\[EIP section\] to learn more about how these ids are created. |

|  [transferFrom](./rain-sdk.gatednft.transferfrom.md) |  | (from: string, to: string, tokenId: BigNumberish, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Transfers <code>tokenId</code> token from <code>from</code> to <code>to</code>.<!-- -->WARNING: Usage of this method is discouraged, use <code>safeTransferFrom()</code> whenever possible.<!-- -->Requirements:<!-- -->- <code>from</code> cannot be the zero address. - <code>to</code> cannot be the zero address. - <code>tokenId</code> token must be owned by <code>from</code>. - If the caller is not <code>from</code>, it must be approved to move this token by either <code>approve()</code> or <code>setApprovalForAll()</code>. |
|  [transferOwnership](./rain-sdk.gatednft.transferownership.md) |  | (newOwner: string, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (<code>newOwner</code>). Can only be called by the current owner. |
